abort.no_devices_found: No RYSE BLE device found in pairing mode. Please Press PAIR button and retry

error.bluetooth_error: Bluetooth error occurred during pairing. Please ensure the device is in range and try again.
error.device_not_selected: No device selected. Please choose a RYSE device before pairing.
error.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred during pairing. Please try again later.

bluetooth_confirm.description: Please press the PAIR button on your RYSE device, then click Submit to start pairing.
bluetooth_confirm.title: Pair your RYSE device

pair.description: Pairing failed. Please press the PAIR button and try again.
pair.title: Pairing RYSE Device

pairing_search.description: No RYSE devices in pairing mode found. Please press the PAIR button and try again.
pairing_search.title: Search for RYSE Devices

user.description: Please click Submit to start pairing.
user.title: Pairing RYSE device
